actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Army to review certain requirements for the project for Anaheim Bay, California.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Army to rewiew the reqirements of local participation for the project for Anaheim Bay, California, with particular reference to Federal and non-Federal cost sharing, and to report his findings to Congress within one year after enactment.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Army to review certain requirements for the project for Anaheim Bay, California.
